dish.desc: Jeera Miri Kolambi Recipe is a delicious appetizer with a kick of pepper and jeera. It is easy to make and can be served as a side dish with your meals too.
No need of Description for this dish.
Spicy chicken with flavored rice ❤️
Aloo gobi is the most common yet most loved dish in North India. This is a dry sauteed dish. Potatoes and cauliflower florets are cooked and sauteed dry with aromatic Indian Spices.
In this recipe, we have cooked the seekh kebab over the tawa so you can make it easily in your kitchen too when you don't have a tandoor or a BBQ grill.

dish.dishName: Murgh Aloo Tikki Recipe - Chicken & Potato Tikki
dish.desc: Murgh Aloo Tikki is an easy chicken cutlet recipe which is served as a starter with any chutney of your choice
Bhindi do pyaza is different from that of the bhindi fry. In this recipe, onion is used twice the quantity of bhindi or okra
This is stir-fried potatoes and capsicum. It's an easy and quick dish. This goes well with roti, poori, paratha, etc.
Peri Peri Fish Fingers are Fish fingers that are crumb coated and fried till crispy and crunchy making it a perfect starter/appetizer for your Indian Dinner Parties.
Chicken & Bell Pepper Skewers Recipe is a lovely party appetizer where the chicken is marinated with soy, honey, fresh pineapple juice and spiced with a good hint of cloves and black pepper powder.
This is an awesome low-carb dish. Lauki bhujia is perfect if you are following a weight loss diet or keto diet
Mexican Chicken Fajita Recipe has the tender chicken strips with all the Mexican flavors topped with sour cream and guacamole
This bharwa baingan is made with the same spices as bharwa karela. these are extremely delicious and perfect as a side dish or main course.
One of the many joys in travelling across a country as vast and diverse as India is its rich culinary heritage

dish.dishName: Stuffed Chicken Pockets Recipe With Mint Mayo
dish.desc: Stuffed Chicken Pockets Recipe With Mint Mayo Recipe is a delicious chicken snack. A dough parcel is stuffed with flavoured chicken and mayo that's deep fried
Rajma masala is one of the popular dishes of North Indian cuisine. It's more loved in Punjab.
A crunchy snack, KFC Style Crispy Chicken Popcorn Recipe is a party appetizer which has succulent pieces of chicken with a crispy flavourful coating
A party appetizer that's super simple to make, this Paprika Chicken Skewers Recipe, will leave your guests asking you for more
Gatte ki sabzi authentically comes from Rajasthan. This is a curd based dish.

dish.dishName: Prawn Cutlets With Sweet Potatoes Wedges
dish.desc: Prawn Cutlets With Sweet Potatoes Wedges is a delicious combination of crunchy Prawn cutlets and baked sweet potatoes wedges.

feedback.review: I also had their house salad which always has more than just lettuce as it should. My wife had the portobello mushroom and spinach quesadilla which she loved. We go here at least one each month.
Great place for lunch!  Nice cozy feeling inside, friendly servers and good food!  I had the country fried steak which was perfect, and the biscuits are as good as everyone says.
I ordered the Mahi that was baked with fresh pineapple salsa on top My Seafood Soup was cream based and chocked full of seafood and potatoes and it was served hot.

I took my brother and the family from Miami to the Dish on there first time trip to Charlotte because it’s a must . Thanks again for making everyone feel so welcome and the food was the best like always.

Are you in the mood for good old home cooking? Then look no further Dish is your spot! Our waitress Ellen was phenomenal kept our drinks topped off and had great recommendations! I had the seafood gumbo and the shrimp and grits everything tasted great.

feedback.restName: Grab a Bite Restaurant and Café
feedback.review: Hands down the BEST restaurant around the Plaza Midwood area! Their service and food were spot on. I had their chicken thigh special and it was one of the best chicken thighs I have ever had. Super juicy, well-seasoned and moist in texture. Our server was friendly and attentive throughout the evening.

Tasty vegan & vegetarian southern food. Missing your great aunt’s deviled eggs? Well, don’t mess up your kitchen, head over to Dish to satisfy that craving. Add in a yummy cocktail, too to round out your experience. I think the vegan coleslaw is some of the best I’ve ever had.

Amazing quality of food with very reasonable price. Me and my friends ordered Meatloaf, Pot Roast, and Country Fried Steak. All of those were delicious and I highly recommend them. Our server was very helpful and warm as well.

Dish still remains a well-kept secret in the Queen City, and that’s just the way we like it. If you ever crave your mom’s cooking, but a much better version, then look no further. Friendly, warm, caring staff, and food that just defines the word comfort. And for goodness sake, get the damn key lime pie, and thank me tomorrow!

feedback.restName: Prawn Cutlets With Sweet Potatoes Wedges
feedback.review: Hands down the BEST restaurant around the Plaza Midwood area! Their service and food were spot on. I had their chicken thigh special and it was one of the best chicken thighs I have ever had. Super juicy, well-seasoned and moist in texture. Our server was friendly and attentive throughout the evening.

Always great comfort food at Dish! I’ve been going there since they opened up many years back. The place hasn’t changed much since it opened, and why mess with what works! The food reminds me of my grandmother’s cooking. I have three favorites that I rotate through, their meatloaf is my favorite, their pot roast is awesome, and their chicken and dumplings are the best I’ve had in Charlotte.

Are you in the mood for good old home cooking? Then look no further Dish is your spot! Our waitress Ellen was phenomenal kept our drinks topped off and had great recommendations! I had the seafood gumbo and the shrimp and grits everything tasted great. Nice upbeat atmosphere decor was eclectic with plates of all different styles on the wall. Overall fun experience and great food be sure to pass through here next time you are in the Plaza Midwood area!
